title: Dealing with OCE
body:
This server is absolutely disgusting. I am so sad that I have got an account to level 30 on this server as the amount of trolls and afkers is amazing. 
So a player starts feeding, telling the opposing team when we are doing dragons and i go afk so i get a 10 minute wait before games, like how does that work? Is there an expectation for me to continue to play when there is someone on my own team undermining our chance of winning? 
Going to play dota I think hopefully their community is a little less toxic

replies.body:
This occurs less and less the higher skill the players you're playing with are.

You are matched with people of your skill.
